question: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of product traceability?

answers.text: It makes it easier to trace counterfeit goods.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Product traceability does make it easier for consumer to know where their products come from.

answers.text: It makes it easier to trace tainted food.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Product traceability makes it easier to trace tainted food.

answers.text: It creates less work for distribution channel members.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Product traceability makes it easier to trace counterfeit goods.

answers.text: It makes it easier for consumers to know where products come from.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Product traceability does not make less work for distribution channel members.

detailedSolution: Product traceability does not make less work for distribution channel members.
